problem.title: Why Companies Need AI Chatbots
problem.description: Customer service teams are overwhelmed with repetitive questions that drain resources and slow response times. Support tickets pile up, SLAs are missed, and customers wait hours (or days) for basic answers. Your team spends 60-80% of their time answering the same 20 questions instead of handling complex issues that require human expertise.
painPoints: Support costs scale linearly with customer growth—every 1000 new users requires 2-3 additional support agents
24/7 global support requires multiple shifts and expensive offshore teams
Knowledge is trapped in documentation that customers can't find or understand
Average response time for simple questions is 4-6 hours, damaging customer satisfaction

solution.title: How Avocado Builds AI Chatbots
solution.description: We build custom conversational AI applications using Google Cloud Vertex AI, natural language processing, and large language models fine-tuned on your specific data. Unlike generic chatbot platforms (Intercom, Drift, Zendesk AI), our chatbots integrate directly with your internal systems, knowledge bases, and APIs to provide accurate, context-aware responses.

features.title: Natural Language Understanding
features.description: Advanced NLP models that understand customer intent, context, and follow-up questions. Built on Google Cloud Vertex AI with custom training on your industry terminology and product documentation.

features.title: Multi-Channel Deployment

phases.description: Analyze your support tickets, FAQs, and documentation. Map common customer intents and questions. Build training dataset and conversation flows. Set up Google Cloud infrastructure and Vertex AI models.

faqs.question: How accurate are AI chatbots built by Avocado?
faqs.answer: Our AI chatbots typically achieve 85-95% intent recognition accuracy after training on your specific data. Accuracy depends on the quality of your training data (support tickets, FAQs, documentation) and the complexity of customer questions. We implement confidence thresholds—if the AI is less than 80% confident in its response, it escalates to a human agent. Our chatbots for BBVA handle thousands of customer inquiries daily with high satisfaction scores.

faqs.question: Can your AI chatbot integrate with our existing customer service platform?
faqs.answer: Yes—we build integrations with all major helpdesk and CRM platforms including Zendesk, Freshdesk, Salesforce, HubSpot, Intercom, and custom internal systems. The chatbot can pull customer data (account status, order history, past tickets), create new support tickets, and escalate conversations to human agents with full context. All integrations are built using secure REST APIs and OAuth authentication.

faqs.question: How long does it take to train an AI chatbot?
faqs.answer: Initial training and deployment takes 3 weeks: Week 1 for data preparation and intent mapping, Week 2 for model training and integrations, Week 3 for testing and production deployment. After launch, the chatbot continues learning from real conversations—we recommend quarterly retraining cycles to improve accuracy as your product and common questions evolve.

faqs.question: What's the difference between your custom chatbots and platforms like Intercom or Drift?
faqs.answer: Generic chatbot platforms are rule-based systems with limited AI capabilities—you manually create decision trees and scripted responses. Avocado builds custom conversational AI using Google Cloud Vertex AI with large language models fine-tuned on your data. Our chatbots understand context, handle complex multi-turn conversations, integrate deeply with your internal systems, and provide accurate answers to questions you never explicitly programmed. You own the code and models.

faqs.question: How much does custom AI chatbot development cost?
faqs.answer: A basic AI chatbot (single channel, 20-30 common intents, simple integrations) typically runs cost-efficient fixed pricing with 3-week delivery. More complex implementations with multi-channel deployment, extensive system integrations, and advanced NLP features take 4-6 weeks. We provide transparent fixed-price quotes after analyzing your support data and requirements. Ongoing costs include Google Cloud infrastructure (typically $200-500/month) and optional retraining cycles.

problem.title: Why Brands Build Custom NFT Marketplaces
problem.description: Generic NFT platforms like OpenSea take 2.5% of every sale, dilute your brand, and give you zero control over the user experience. Your fans are buried among millions of unrelated NFT collections. You can't customize the interface, integrate with your loyalty program, or capture customer data. Using a white-label platform means limited features and vendor lock-in with monthly fees.
painPoints: Lost revenue to platform fees (2.5% on OpenSea plus 2.5% creator royalties)
No brand control—your NFTs appear next to spam collections and low-quality art
Cannot integrate NFT ownership with your existing loyalty programs or CRM
No customer data—the platform owns the relationship with your fans

solution.title: How Avocado Builds NFT Marketplaces
solution.description: We develop fully custom NFT marketplace platforms with your branding, features, and business logic. Fans mint and trade NFTs on your domain using credit cards (no crypto knowledge required) or Web3 wallets like MetaMask. Smart contracts enforce royalties, rarity systems, and unlockable content. You own the code, customer data, and entire user experience.

features.title: Smart Contract Development
features.description: ERC-721 and ERC-1155 NFT contracts with custom features: lazy minting, royalty enforcement, allowlists, Dutch auctions, and reveal mechanics. Built in Solidity with comprehensive testing and security audits. Gas-optimized for low transaction costs.

Smart contract security audit and gas optimization. End-to-end testing with testnet NFTs. Production deployment to mainnet. Monitoring setup and analytics integration. Knowledge transfer and admin training.

faqs.question: What NFT marketplaces has Avocado built?
faqs.answer: Avocado has built NFT platforms for Chivas (one of Mexico's most valuable soccer teams) and Club América featuring digital collectibles, match highlights, and exclusive fan experiences. These marketplaces handle minting, trading, royalty distribution, and fiat checkout. Our clients have generated significant revenue and media coverage from their NFT drops.

faqs.question: Should I build on Ethereum, Polygon, or Solana?
faqs.answer: Ethereum has the largest NFT ecosystem and highest perceived value, but transaction fees (gas) can be $20-100 per mint. Polygon offers Ethereum compatibility with near-zero fees ($0.01-0.10), making it ideal for high-volume projects and mainstream users. Solana provides the fastest transactions but has a smaller NFT community. We typically recommend Polygon for sports teams and brands targeting mainstream audiences.

faqs.question: How do users buy NFTs without owning cryptocurrency?
faqs.answer: We integrate fiat payment processors like Stripe or Crossmint that accept credit cards and debit cards. When a user purchases an NFT with USD, the payment processor converts it to cryptocurrency behind the scenes and executes the blockchain transaction. The user receives the NFT in a custodial wallet we create for them—no MetaMask setup or crypto knowledge required. Advanced users can still connect their own Web3 wallets.

faqs.question: How do NFT royalties work and are they enforceable?
faqs.answer: Royalties are programmed into the smart contract—every time an NFT is resold, a percentage (typically 5-10%) is automatically sent to the creator's wallet address. However, royalties are only enforceable on marketplaces that respect them. OpenSea made royalties optional in 2023. A custom marketplace guarantees royalty enforcement because you control the trading platform. Royalties generate passive income from secondary market activity.

faqs.question: How much does it cost to build a custom NFT marketplace?
faqs.answer: A basic NFT marketplace (single collection, minting and trading features, one blockchain) typically requires 4 weeks at cost-efficient fixed pricing. More complex platforms with multi-chain support, auction mechanics, token-gated features, and extensive integrations take 6-8 weeks. Ongoing costs include blockchain network fees for contract deployment (one-time), IPFS storage ($50-200/month), and cloud hosting ($100-300/month).

problem.title: The Smart Contract Risk Problem
problem.description: One bug in a smart contract can cost millions. Unlike traditional software where you can deploy patches, smart contracts are immutable once deployed to the blockchain. Security vulnerabilities have led to $3+ billion in hacks across DeFi protocols. Finding experienced Solidity developers is difficult—most have less than 3 years of experience because the technology is new.
painPoints: Reentrancy attacks, integer overflow, and access control bugs cause catastrophic fund losses
Gas-inefficient contracts cost users $50-200 per transaction, making your product unusable
Most blockchain developers have only built side projects, not production systems handling real money
Failed audits delay your launch by months and cost $50,000+ in security consultant fees

solution.title: How Avocado Builds Secure Smart Contracts
solution.description: Our blockchain development team has built production smart contracts handling millions in transaction volume for Bitso and other fintech companies. Every contract goes through comprehensive testing, automated security analysis, gas optimization, and manual code review before deployment. We follow OpenZeppelin standards and industry best practices established by Ethereum Foundation.

features.title: Security-First Development
features.description: Unit tests with 100% code coverage, automated security scanning with Slither and MythX, manual audit by senior developers, protection against reentrancy attacks, integer overflow, and common vulnerabilities. Every high-value contract receives third-party security audit.

features.title: Gas Optimization
features.description: Minimize transaction costs through efficient data structures, storage slot packing, and optimized Solidity patterns. Our contracts typically use 30-50% less gas than industry average, saving users money on every transaction.

features.title: Multi-Chain Deployment

Write Solidity contracts following OpenZeppelin standards. Build comprehensive unit and integration tests using Hardhat or Foundry. Achieve 100% code coverage. Test on local blockchain and public testnets.

Run automated security analysis (Slither, MythX, Aderyn). Manual code review by senior blockchain developers. Gas optimization and benchmarking. Fix vulnerabilities and edge cases discovered during testing.

Third-party security audit for high-value contracts (optional). Mainnet deployment with multi-sig wallet. Verification on blockchain explorers (Etherscan). Monitoring and incident response setup. Documentation and knowledge transfer.

faqs.question: What types of smart contracts does Avocado develop?
faqs.answer: We build ERC-20 tokens, ERC-721 and ERC-1155 NFT contracts, DeFi protocols (staking, lending, DEXs, liquidity pools), DAO governance systems, multi-signature wallets, vesting contracts, and custom business logic. Our experience includes production contracts for Bitso (crypto exchange infrastructure), Chivas and Club América (NFT platforms), and various DeFi protocols.

faqs.question: How does Avocado ensure smart contract security?
faqs.answer: Every contract goes through: (1) comprehensive unit and integration tests with 100% code coverage, (2) automated security analysis using Slither, MythX, and Aderyn, (3) manual code review by senior Solidity developers checking for reentrancy, overflow, access control, and other vulnerabilities, (4) testnet deployment and stress testing, (5) third-party security audit for high-value contracts. We follow OpenZeppelin libraries and Ethereum best practices.

faqs.question: Can you audit existing smart contracts built by another team?
faqs.answer: Yes—we provide standalone smart contract audits and security reviews. Our audit includes automated scanning, manual code review, gas optimization recommendations, and a detailed report of findings categorized by severity (critical, high, medium, low). Typical audit turnaround is 1-2 weeks depending on contract complexity. We also offer post-audit remediation where we fix the vulnerabilities we discover.

faqs.question: Should my smart contracts be upgradeable or immutable?
faqs.answer: Immutable contracts (cannot be changed after deployment) are more secure and trustworthy—users know the rules can't change. Upgradeable contracts using proxy patterns allow you to fix bugs and add features, but introduce additional complexity and potential attack vectors. We recommend immutable contracts for tokens and NFTs, upgradeable contracts for DeFi protocols and complex business logic that may need iteration.

faqs.question: How much does smart contract development cost?
faqs.answer: Simple contracts (ERC-20 token, basic NFT collection) take 1-2 weeks at cost-efficient fixed pricing. Complex DeFi protocols with multiple contracts and advanced logic require 4-8 weeks. Third-party security audits cost $20,000-50,000 and add 2-3 weeks. We provide transparent fixed-price quotes after reviewing your requirements. All pricing includes testing, deployment, and verification.

faqs.question: What loyalty platforms has Avocado built?

faqs.question: Should my loyalty program use blockchain technology?
faqs.answer: Blockchain makes sense if you want: (1) points that customers can trade or transfer to others, (2) transparent point issuance and balance verification, (3) integration with NFT collectibles or token-gated experiences. For most traditional retail loyalty programs, a conventional database-backed system is simpler and more cost-effective. We help you decide based on your business model and customer demographics.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with my existing e-commerce platform?
faqs.answer: Yes—we build integrations with all major e-commerce platforms including Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, BigCommerce, and custom-built stores. The integration syncs orders, customer data, and inventory in real-time so points are awarded automatically at checkout and customers can redeem rewards directly on your site. We also integrate with POS systems for in-store point earning.

faqs.question: How do you make loyalty programs more engaging than discount codes?
faqs.answer: We use gamification psychology: achievement badges for milestones, leaderboards to create competition, limited-time challenges with exclusive rewards, progress bars showing how close customers are to the next tier, and social proof showing what others are earning. The best rewards are experiences (meet-and-greets, early access, exclusive products) not just discounts. NFT collectibles work exceptionally well for younger audiences.

faqs.question: How much does custom loyalty platform development cost?

Compare this to 3-5% transaction fees plus $500-2000/month for SaaS loyalty platforms—a custom platform pays for itself in 6-12 months for mid-size brands.
